Package moving

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ability
    A default ability.
    AssetManager
    This class loads and stores ALL IMAGES in the entire game.
    Background
    Manages the background, drawing it, and moving it around.
    Body
    A Body armor.
    Boss1
    A boss enemy.
    Boss1Mine
    The bomb/mine that the Boss1 releases in his second battle phase.
    Button
    A clickable button.
    Cell
    A single Cell in the Grid of Cells that represents the entire map on which the player moves.
    Chaser
    An enemy that chases you and jumps if you are above it.
    DamageText
    The text that displays above the enemy/player when an enemy or the player gets hurt or healed.
    Door
    Creates a door.
    ELC
    ELC stands for Eclipse Level Creator.
    ELCCell
    A single cell on the map.
    ELCWorker
    The Worker class for the Eclipse Level Creator.
    Enemy
    The default enemy.
    Enemy3
    An Example enemy.
    Fade
    Takes care of fading the screen.
    Foot
    A Foot armor.
    Game
    The game.
    Gavin
    We did not want to rename this enemy as an honor to one of our team members.
    Grid
    The Grid which is the map on which objects will interact.
    Head
    A Head armor.
    HyperChaser
    A stronger version of the Chaser.
    IcicleDropper
    A stationary enemy with high health and gives a LOT of experience.
    Item
    Manages and stores all values for an Item.
    Main
    This class is the Main manager.
    MeleeWeapon
    A Melee Weapon.
    MenuScreen
    Handles all updating and drawing for the initial title/menu screen.
    Message
    Displays and updates the in-game messages.
    Music
    Plays the background music.
    NPC
    An NPC is a character that talks to the player but cannot be played by the player.
    Player
    Stores all data for the player and manages it.
    PotionJar
    Stores and updates all information for a Potion Jar.
    RangedWeapon
    A Ranged Weapon.
    Shot
    Contains all info/data for a single bullet/shot and updates all information for it.
    Sounds
    Plays sound effects.
    SuperChaser
    A stronger version of the Chaser.
    TestEnemy
    An Enemy made just for testing purposes.
    TreasureChest
    A treasure chest.
    UFO
    A flying enemy.
    UnlockedMessage
    An unlocked message is almost the same thing as a normal Message, which we refer to as a "locked" message, but the unlocked message does not restrict player actions.
    Weapon
    A general "shell" for a weapon.
